price: 24. Alle waa Abuuraha, uumaha wax waliba, sawiraha qaabsiiyaha ah. Isagaa leh Magacyada wanaagsan ee quruxda badan. Waxaa (Alle) Xurmo weyneeya oo ka hufa (xumaan) waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo arlada, Waana Adkaadaha, Xakiimka ah.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu al-khāliqu al-bāri-u al-muṣawiru lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā yusabbiḥu lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
